Interface Controller

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ControllerImpl
    public interface Controller
    This is an interface for controller for stock. It controls the data flow into model object and updates the view whenever data changes. It keeps view and model separate.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addPortfolioData​(java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> dataToAdd, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String currentDate)
      This function takes in a list of lists of strings, a string, and a string, and adds the data to the portfolio.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> handleAddACompanyStock()
      This function adds a company stock to the user's portfolio.
      void handleDateSelection()
      When the user selects a date, handleDateSelection() is called.
      void handleFastForwardTime()
      This method shows the futuristic prices of the stocks.
      java.lang.String handleGetPortfolioName()
      Get the name of the portfolio
      void handlePortfolioComposition()
      This method handles the composition of portfolio.
      void handlePortfolioCreation()
      This method handles the portfolio creations.
      void handleShowCompanies()
      Displays all the companies stocks listed.
      void handleShowPortfolio()
      This method asks the model ModelImpl.getListOfPortfolio() to give it an array of strings of all the files in the src\\portfolios\\ directory.
      java.lang.String handleTotalStockOnCurrentDate​(java.lang.String portfolioName)
      Given a portfolio name, return the total stock on the current date.
      void handleTotalStockOnDifferentDate​(java.lang.String portfolioName)
      Given a portfolio name, it will return the total stock value of the portfolio on a different date.
      void handleTotalStockValueDisplay()
      Displays the total value of a particular portfolio.
      void handleUploadFile()
      Handles the portfolio file uploaded by user.
      void start()
      This method views all the initial options to the user at start of program.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        void start()
        This method views all the initial options to the user at start of program.

      • handlePortfolioCreation

        void handlePortfolioCreation()
        This method handles the portfolio creations. It shows further options for new portfolio.

      • handlePortfolioComposition

        void handlePortfolioComposition()
        This method handles the composition of portfolio. It shows further options for already created portfolio.

      • handleFastForwardTime

        void handleFastForwardTime()
        This method shows the futuristic prices of the stocks.

      • handleTotalStockValueDisplay

        void handleTotalStockValueDisplay()
        Displays the total value of a particular portfolio.

      • handleShowCompanies

        void handleShowCompanies()
        Displays all the companies stocks listed.

      • handleAddACompanyStock

        java.util.List<java.lang.String> handleAddACompanyStock()
        This function adds a company stock to the user's portfolio.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of String The list of name of company with number of stocks.

      • handleGetPortfolioName

        java.lang.String handleGetPortfolioName()
        Get the name of the portfolio
        Returns:
        The name of the portfolio.

      • addPortfolioData

        void addPortfolioData​(java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> dataToAdd,
                      java.lang.String name,
                      java.lang.String currentDate)
        This function takes in a list of lists of strings, a string, and a string, and adds the data to the portfolio.
        Parameters:
        dataToAdd - A list of lists of strings. Each list of strings represents a row of data . The first string in the list is name of company, the second string is the number of shares, and the third string is the date.
        name - The name of the portfolio you want to add data to.
        currentDate - The date of the data you are adding.

      • handleDateSelection

        void handleDateSelection()
        When the user selects a date, handleDateSelection() is called.

      • handleTotalStockOnCurrentDate

        java.lang.String handleTotalStockOnCurrentDate​(java.lang.String portfolioName)
        Given a portfolio name, return the total stock on the current date.
        Parameters:
        portfolioName - The name of the portfolio.
        Returns:
        The total stock value of the portfolio on the current date.

      • handleTotalStockOnDifferentDate

        void handleTotalStockOnDifferentDate​(java.lang.String portfolioName)
        Given a portfolio name, it will return the total stock value of the portfolio on a different date.
        Parameters:
        portfolioName - The name of the portfolio.

      • handleUploadFile

        void handleUploadFile()
        Handles the portfolio file uploaded by user.

      • handleShowPortfolio

        void handleShowPortfolio()
        This method asks the model ModelImpl.getListOfPortfolio() to give it an array of strings of all the files in the src\\portfolios\\ directory. Then it tells the view View.displayPortfolioName(String) to display the portfolio name.
